channel.title: Server Compiler
channel.description:
Not sure why its not working :/ says
[code]Compiling Darkscape by Prayer javac: no source files Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Correctly compiled Prayer Press any key to continue . . .
[/code]
This is my compiler [code]@echo off title DarkScape Compiler echo Compiling Darkscape by Prayer "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_29\bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/*; -sourcepath src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo Correctly compiled Prayer pause[/code]
I have java 29 i know that idk why it wont compile i know its got somethin to do with the src/com/rs2hd stuff but idk what to fix :/

@modzilla wrote:

i know i have everything in the right place

item.title: Server Compiler
item.dc:creator: @jr_fizzy jr fizzy
item.description:
@jr_fizzy wrote:

idk if anyones said this yet i cba to read all the comments. but the last i saw someones compiler not working the problem was that he had to move his java jdk files from (x86) to just normal program files hope this helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Compiler
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

If you are no longer on a 64bit then it is x86.

Read full topic

@modzilla wrote:

item.title: Server Compiler
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

Yes without .exe it will say that.
If that does not work as i said try changing the -cp to -classpath or try reinstalling your JDK i believe there is a new version like 1.7.0_01.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

modzilla:

when i have .exe it doesnt give the no path specified it gives the no source files still

i was saying if you didn’t have .exe it would say no path specified.

Did you replace any files in your source with files from another server?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Compiler
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

when i have .exe it doesnt give the no path specified it gives the no source files still

Read full topic

item.title: Server Compiler
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

@echo off title DarkScape Compiler echo Compiling Darkscape by Prayer cd src cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_29\bin\javac.exe" -cp bin -cp deps/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo Correctly compiled Prayer pause
Try that and if that doesn’t work change the “-cp” to “-classpath”

Read full topic

item.title: Server Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“Lil wayne fan, post:9, topic:420955”][quote author=modzilla link=topic=523628.msg3809428#msg3809428 date=1320777391]
Ok well so far none of this has worked and i appreciate it winter but i dont have 5 hours to study compilers

This compiler was working like 3 days ago on a windows 7 now since its windows vista idk what needs to be changed…
[/quote]
your missing “.exe” at the end of javac[/quote]

Lol. You do realize that would give a complete different error message.

It would say couldn’t find the path specified.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

Try using an IDE, it handles compilation for you! Then when you’re confident with the Java language you can learn how to compile it on your own. Otherwise try the official tutorials. These will explain compiling for you:

http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/getStarted/index.html

Read full topic
